name: R E F L E C T E D
name_original: R E F L E C T E D
description:
Think before jumping. In this puzzle platformer you will have to control a little rice ball called Ricy. Help him reaching his goal by teleporting him to his reflected position.

Features:
- 30 handcrafted levels with progressive difficulty;
- Beaultiful pixel art synthwave-themed;
- A new mechanic is introduced every 3 levels (sort of);
- Eastern elements (it's a rice ball near Mout Fuji and checkpoints are chopsticks);
- Original soundtrack synthwave-themed;
